attributes.review:
Let’s start how bad this app is :)
It took about 2-3 days to download 
It glitches my phone how fun!
Never install this if u don’t want ur phone to glitch and break 
Like mine did so I’m reporting from my iPad of how bad the glitch is! My phone is gonna be in the repair shop for about a couple weeks! How nice! Please stay safe and don’t download this app! 😌wow how nice of this app!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: Not only did it take 2 hours for this app to download, but every time I attempted to enter the app I immediately got kicked out. After a few note attempts my phone shut down and stopped working completely! It took three days for my phone to finally turn back on. This app needs to get removed permanently!
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!

attributes.review: This app took soooooo long to download unlike any app I’ve seen before! I knew this orange guy were talking about wasn’t great but then I downloaded this dumb app to try and cleanse my libtard soul of bernie sanders BUT THEN I realized this app taking forever to download must have been a sign that my libtard ways are probably what’s best for the world and myself so I’m not converting to big racist orange man 😡
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: This app took hours to load! When it downloaded I got in to the app and it was a black screen for 20 minutes! This app is a disgusting. There was a lot of spelling errors and when I tried to make an account it would not let me type or submit. This app is absolutely horrible!
attributes.title: This is horrible !

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see the trumpies app thingy and all of a sudden my milk had disappeared from the oven like are you freaking kidding me??? I put it there a minute ago and when I downloaded the app it had disappeared how absolutely disgusting and such a ripoff..I decided to upgrade to premium and almost choked on an almond like what is going on. TERRIBLE APP TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE !!
attributes.title: Disappointing...

attributes.review: I have never been disrespected like this in my life. I went to try and download the app and then all of a sudden it stopped downloading and gave me a notification saying HORRIBLE things like “n***ers can’t download this app” or “n***er detected”. But i mean what else can you expect from a white supremacist supporting app😔 if i could rate this a zero i would🥺
attributes.title: the app called me a racial slur.

attributes.review: This app has nothing to offer except fake news. It spammed my phone with text messages and notifications all night. It was a horrible experience and the first thing I had to do when I woke up was delete the app. I really wanted to support the president but after everything he’s done I don’t think so.
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: Got this app because I wanted to know what my dumb boomer of a dad was up to same with the big orange man. The app is crap and functions weirdly. 0/10 would not download again I suggest that who ever is planing on downloading this just don’t your making a mistake. Like I said it doesn’t even function correctly kinda like are orangutan president.
attributes.title: Not a good app ✨

attributes.review: I downloaded this app wanting to support this obviously deformed orange 🍊 and guess what the next morning I saw the orange himself 😱😱banging on my window screaming 5 stars ⭐️ and I was super scared then a orange bomb fell from the  ceiling!!😨then it exploded and then millions of trump ants flew at my face and attacked me 🐜 I was on the floor dying when I grabbed my phone and deleted the app 😡don’t download you will die 🤭💀
attributes.title: How dare you self tanner orange 🍊 😡

attributes.review: Absolutely horrendous app! Never opens, does not support BLM, literally always crashes, stops Indigenous people from practicing their constitutional rights, and overall has horrible design. I highly recommend for others and the apple App Store TO DELETE this application. It will RUIN your platform! So to end this #Allcountriesmatter #notmypresident :)
attributes.title: Why is this still on App Store?
